archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Control Customer Inventory Access
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Managing the registration and access control processes that enable processes to create, modify, update, delete and/or download customer data to and from the customer inventory; Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Reserved for future use.
